refnamediv.refpurpose: Convenience library for parsing vc1 video bitstream.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: For more details about the structures, look at the smpte specifications (S421m-2006.pdf).

refsect2.title: gst_vc1_identify_next_bdu ()
refsect2.programlisting: GstVC1ParserResult gst_vc1_identify_next_bdu (const guint8 *data, gsize size, GstVC1BDU *bdu);
refsect2.para: Parses data and fills bdu fields

entry.para: The GstVC1BDU where to store parsed bdu headers.

refsect2.title: gst_vc1_parse_sequence_header ()
refsect2.programlisting: GstVC1ParserResult gst_vc1_parse_sequence_header (const guint8 *data, gsize size, GstVC1SeqHdr *seqhdr);
refsect2.para: Parses data , and fills seqhdr fields.

refsect2.title: gst_vc1_parse_sequence_layer ()
refsect2.programlisting: GstVC1ParserResult gst_vc1_parse_sequence_layer (const guint8 *data, gsize size, GstVC1SeqLayer *seqlayer);
refsect2.para: Parses data , and fills seqlayer fields.

refsect2.title: gst_vc1_parse_sequence_header_struct_a ()
refsect2.programlisting: GstVC1ParserResult gst_vc1_parse_sequence_header_struct_a (const guint8 *data, gsize size, GstVC1SeqStructA *structa);
refsect2.para: Parses data , and fills structa fields.

refsect2.title: gst_vc1_parse_sequence_header_struct_b ()
refsect2.programlisting: GstVC1ParserResult gst_vc1_parse_sequence_header_struct_b (const guint8 *data, gsize size, GstVC1SeqStructB *structb);
refsect2.para: Parses data , and fills structb fields.

refsect2.title: gst_vc1_parse_sequence_header_struct_c ()
refsect2.programlisting: GstVC1ParserResult gst_vc1_parse_sequence_header_struct_c (const guint8 *data, gsize size, GstVC1SeqStructC *structc);
refsect2.para: Parses data , and fills structc fields.

refsect2.title: gst_vc1_parse_entry_point_header ()
refsect2.programlisting: GstVC1ParserResult gst_vc1_parse_entry_point_header (const guint8 *data, gsize size, GstVC1EntryPointHdr *entrypoint, GstVC1SeqHdr *seqhdr);
refsect2.para: Parses data , and sets entrypoint fields.

refsect2.title: gst_vc1_parse_frame_header ()
refsect2.programlisting: GstVC1ParserResult gst_vc1_parse_frame_header (const guint8 *data, gsize size, GstVC1FrameHdr *framehdr, GstVC1SeqHdr *seqhdr, GstVC1BitPlanes *bitplanes);
refsect2.para: Parses data , and fills entrypoint fields.

entry.para: The GstVC1BitPlanes to store bitplanes in or NULL

refsect2.title: gst_vc1_bitplanes_new ()
refsect2.programlisting: GstVC1BitPlanes * gst_vc1_bitplanes_new (void);
refsect2.para: Creates a new GstVC1BitPlanes. It should be freed with gst_vc1_bitplanes_free() after use.

refsect2.title: gst_vc1_bitplanes_free ()
refsect2.programlisting: void gst_vc1_bitplanes_free (GstVC1BitPlanes *bitplanes);

refsect2.title: gst_vc1_bitplanes_free_1 ()
refsect2.programlisting: void gst_vc1_bitplanes_free_1 (GstVC1BitPlanes *bitplanes);

refsect2.title: gst_vc1_bitplanes_ensure_size ()
refsect2.para: Fills the bitplanes structure from seqhdr , this function should be called after gst_vc1_parse_sequence_header if in simple or main mode, or after gst_vc1_parse_entry_point_header if in advanced mode.

entry.para: The GstVC1SeqHdr from which to set bitplanes

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if everything went fine, FALSE otherwise

refsect2.title: MAX_HRD_NUM_LEAKY_BUCKETS
refsect2.programlisting: #define MAX_HRD_NUM_LEAKY_BUCKETS 31

refsect2.title: GST_VC1_BFRACTION_BASIS
refsect2.programlisting: #define GST_VC1_BFRACTION_BASIS 840

refsect2.title: struct GstVC1SeqHdr
refsect2.para: Structure for sequence headers in any profile.

refsect2.title: struct GstVC1AdvancedSeqHdr
refsect2.para: Structure for the advanced profile sequence headers specific parameters.

refsect2.title: struct GstVC1SeqLayer
struct GstVC1SeqStructA
struct GstVC1SeqStructB
struct GstVC1SeqStructC
struct GstVC1HrdParam
struct GstVC1EntryPointHdr
refsect2.para: Structure for entrypoint header, this will be used only in advanced profiles

refsect2.title: struct GstVC1FrameHdr
refsect2.para: Structure that represent picture in any profile or mode. You should look at ptype and profile to know what is currently in use.

refsect2.title: struct GstVC1PicAdvanced
struct GstVC1PicSimpleMain
GstVC1Picture
refsect2.programlisting: typedef struct _GstVC1Picture GstVC1Picture;

refsect2.title: struct GstVC1VopDquant
struct GstVC1BDU
refsect2.para: Structure that represents a Bitstream Data Unit.
